query.name: archivedToS3_count
query.text: select org_id, count(distinct(doc_id)) as doc_count from summary_docreceiver_archive where status=? group by org_id

query.name: parse_count
query.text: select a.org_id, a.status, a.error_message, count(distinct a.doc_id) as doc_count, a.sent_to_ocr, a.sent_to_persist from summary_parser a join summary_coordinator_jobfinish b on a.job_id = b.job_id where b.status = "success" group by a.org_id, a.status, a.error_message, a.sent_to_ocr, a.sent_to_persist

query.name: ocr_count
query.text: select a.org_id, a.status, a.error_message, count(distinct a.doc_id) as doc_count from summary_ocr a join summary_coordinator_jobfinish b on a.job_id = b.job_id where b.status = "success" group by a.org_id, a.status, a.error_message

query.name: persist_count
query.text: select a.org_id, a.status, a.error_message, count(distinct a.doc_id) as doc_count from summary_persist_mapper_staging a join summary_coordinator_jobfinish b on a.job_id = b.job_id where b.status = "success" group by a.org_id, a.status, a.error_message

query.name: verified_count
query.text: select org_id, count(distinct doc_id) as doc_count from summary_qafromseqfile where patient_key is not null group by org_id
